anonymous.label: Anonymous
anonymous.tooltip: Click to change the state from on to off.
anonymous.info: The rating will be anonymous. No user information will be available to you. The participants in this rating will be advised that the rating is anonymous.

resultViewable.label: Result Viewable
resultViewable.tooltip: Click to change the state from on to off.
resultViewable.info: The result will be available to the participants while the rating is active. If the rating is not private then all the public will see the result.

private.label: Private Petition
private.tooltip: The petition will be private. You must invite raters from the friends.
private.info: By making the rating private you can select from your friend list the people you want to rate.

location.label: Restrict Location
location.tooltip: Restrict where the rating is acccessible from.

socialize.label: Socialize Petition
socialize.tooltip: Publish this petition to your social network.
